website_summaries.verdict: One of the larger waste disposal containers available, holding up to 100 needles.
pros: Used and appreciated by customers with diabetic conditions as well as those with  acupuncture services, in need of a container that can properly dispose of a variety of needles
Price point is an attractive selling point
Unit's tight lid keeps harmful waste away from hands and paws
cons: May not hold up over the test of time

customer_reviews.title: Not a Large Kendall Sharps Container
customer_reviews.text: This is not a large Kendall container. If you look at the picture I took you will see a large container on the right. It looks just like their picture. The one they sent me is on the left, much smaller. Misleading to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: True Texian

customer_reviews.title: Large Sharps Container
customer_reviews.text: We had had a lot of used sharps piled up in old juice jars. We got these containers, filled them up and took them to our doctor's office and it was so nice to have them out of the house. We feel better using the correct containers for disposal. Each container held at least a full 48oz. bottle of discarded sharps.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Not large at all
customer_reviews.text: I agree with a few of the other reviews using the word "large" in the item description was slightly misleading but I guess it was my fault too for not looking at the specs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a LARGE container
customer_reviews.text: These are not large containers. The picture is a total misrepresentation. This container is not much taller than a soda can.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTINE LEANOS

customer_reviews.title: Would probably be fine, if it came with a lid
customer_reviews.text: Would probably be fine, if it came with a lid, but mine did not, a sharps container isn't any good without a lid, so I am returning it. Without the matching lid, it can't be used as a sharps container, its just a red bucket. Will not be ordering online again.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Allen

customer_reviews.title: It is a great price so I would buy again just in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be larger than it is. My hubby is a Type 1 Diabetic that tests 4x per day and takes insulin 4x so the needles add up quickly. About a months worth filled 1/4 of this container. It is a great price so I would buy again just in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great for insulin pump supply sharps ...
customer_reviews.text: For several years I did multiple daily injections. I used a B&D Sharps container, which did a good job. However, the standard B&D Sharps container had too small a hole to insert the sharps from the insulin pump cartridge. This will do the job admirably. And if you have a much larger than normal object, simply swivel the top to allow a large object to be placed within.
customer_reviews.author: John B. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Use this container for dispose of needles useage daily. Makes it so much easier to have a nice container. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: What can one say about a sharps container that won't have the police knocking on your door? ;) Seriously, I used to always buy the smaller ones because they're cheap, but they fill up so fast! This one is nice and big, and well worth the money. Ounce for ounce, it's a better value!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis & Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Just what i was needing and at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me. Lit slides around to open and close then when it's full you can rotate it a little further and it locks closed.
customer_reviews.author: KA Nielson

customer_reviews.title: Good size and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size sharps container for home use. Assembly (to put the lid on) takes force and dexterity as all clips have to snap in. If you are elderly or have coordination issues or weakness in hand, may want to have someone else do it.
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: INCOMPLETE ORDER
customer_reviews.text: Great size and opening but I ordered 2 containers and only 1 lid. I need another lid.
customer_reviews.author: cecilia marshall

customer_reviews.title: Barely big enough for Biologic pens
customer_reviews.text: Barely tall enough to hold Enbrel/Humira injectable pens. Open just big enough to take Cimzia prefilled syringes. Not big enough to handle pens from weekly Enbrel.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Good size for diabetic cat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent capacity for a cat needing twice-daily insulin injections. Right in that sweet spot where it will actually last a while, without being intrusively large.
customer_reviews.author: KitNorth

customer_reviews.title: this is the perfect size to fit on my kitchen counter in the ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the perfect size to fit on my kitchen counter in the corner by the sink. I will definitely buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: marshaelaine

customer_reviews.title: It's a plastic box
customer_reviews.text: Kinda pricey for a plastic box. It holds syringes no problem, and my waste collection facility accepted it without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Johnson

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice needle and attachments storage container
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a nice needle and attachments storage container. Shipped fast and received carefully boxed. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Snooks

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than the old one
customer_reviews.text: The old one was full - this one is bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Works Wel
customer_reviews.text: While not quite as large as I thought it would be, it does hold my used needles and keeps them safely away from children and accidental needlesticks.
customer_reviews.author: M. Marhanka

customer_reviews.title: Definitely A Sharps Container!
customer_reviews.text: This Sharps container was much smaller than what I expected and that is completely my fault. Two quarts sounded larger in my head for some reason. The container itself is very nice - the lid has a large opening for bigger huber needles and tubing and the sides seem to be made of thicker plastic (ugh, I hate buying plastic!). Just a note of caution to anyone purchasing this specific container, however, 2.2 quarts is not very big!
customer_reviews.author: NVanPutt

customer_reviews.title: Not as large as I thought it would be but still a good size. Wonderful price as well
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Not as large as I thought it would be but still a good size. Wonderful price as well.
customer_reviews.author: wend

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design but too small!
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Ordered 2 Gal. model, got tiny 2 Qt. model.
customer_reviews.author: John Conrod

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had gotten this one from the pharmacy. I was on IM and subcutaneous injections for several weeks and the pharmacy only sent me one little sharps container. This was the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra Giammattei

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This item is great to use in the home. I am on insulin and this larger container helps with not havng to emply it as often and it very good quality. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Or Judy Todd

customer_reviews.title: Sharps Container you can count on.
customer_reviews.text: It was good for what I needed, but I think I'll need the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: It exactly what is says it is
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as picture on Amazon and does exactly what it was designed to do. I would recommend this item to anyone looking to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceManGeorge

customer_reviews.title: i order 5 of 2 gallon container, but received ...
customer_reviews.text: i order 5 of 2 gallon container, but received only 1 quart ones, which are much smaller than what I paid for. not honest, but do not want to bother returning. i will never purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: kai hu

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the container is fine, just not as big as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Porfert

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: Was too small for my needs but was easy to drop in syringes and close it up when I was done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kel1021

customer_reviews.title: Sharps container is really good
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to anyone who has to give themselves shots. Tho I might get the larger one next time.
customer_reviews.author: Verne E. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Sharps Container
customer_reviews.text: great for diabetics who are on insulin holds a lot like the needle break feature that way inulin needles can't be used again
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it's too small, too expensive and the cover doesn't fit the container
customer_reviews.author: Rowena Salaver

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't quite receive what I thought I was getting but I can still use what I got
customer_reviews.author: Heather Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Eh...disappointing to never get lid
customer_reviews.text: They never shipped the lid which is very disappointing. In essence, no lid makes this container useless and means you have to find another way to dispose of your sharps.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Higgs

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The top doesnt have a lock on it. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Sharps Container-Large Volume-2.2 Quarts
customer_reviews.text: Containers are just what I need. Also easy to dispose of my syringes and the price was just the right amount.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Read the measurements before you order
customer_reviews.text: When it said large I assumed (foolish of me) that it was "large". I guess I neglected to read the measurements. It is of no use to me so I will have to return it I guess.
customer_reviews.author: roejon

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Container-Large Volume 2.2.Quarts
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product to anyone who has to dispose of needles due to daily injections for diabetes. This is 5 Star product! and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ora Alger

customer_reviews.title: Find Lower priced one
customer_reviews.text: It is big container and it does its's job. Not sure if it is priced competitively.One can find lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Pain Killer

customer_reviews.title: smaller than 2.2 quarts
customer_reviews.text: I received a very small container. NOT 2.2 Quarts - only 1/3 to 1/2 of it. The small container was not worth the price of a 2 quart container. It was returned!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't what I thougt
customer_reviews.text: It was too small. It appeared to be larger on the picture. So therefore I ordered it. I guess I fail to look at the size of the container.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - but please pay attention to the size of it, only 2 quarts.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as stated. I made the mistake of 'assuming' that "Large" meant large. I should have noticed the 2.2 Quart measurement. It is much smaller than what I intended to buy. I've included a photo for perspective. But otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.author: N. Weddle

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: I am a diabetic and use 5 syringes per day. The other sizes I purchased were too small and filled up quickly. I purchased this one and it lasts for a couple of months. One thing I did was remove the tabs so I can take the top off. I have cats and buy the kitty litter in those large pails. When this container is full I transfer the waste into a empty kitty litter bucket which I am legally allowed to dispose of with my weekly trash. I would definitely check and see what your local laws were regarding disposal of medical waste before doing what I do.
customer_reviews.author: Philip C. Casper

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: This is not a large, I could fill with one infusion supply. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Pie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Described, Perfect for Needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Intramuscular injections with 3 cc syringes and 1.5 inch needles store well and unobtrusively. Not too big, not too small, just right. Price is affordable. I'll continue to buy from this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: AdoreInVegas

customer_reviews.title: Great container
customer_reviews.text: Does as advertised. Keeps sharps where they need to be after being used.
customer_reviews.author: dubbug

customer_reviews.title: Fits injection pens
customer_reviews.text: I use Bydureon injection pen. This box is large enough to fit about a dozen of these pens plus my other diabetic testing strips and my lancet drums. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute little container. It arrived 3 days after I ordered it! So thumbs up on the shipping! I thought it would be bigger but it'll do for now. I had no problems with the openings. I think it's perfect for now. I'm a diabetic and I use needles every day. Should last me for a couple of weeks...
customer_reviews.author: Noemi Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good small size sharps container
customer_reviews.text: Its a sharps container, functions how you would want it to. Good size for the home, for a tabletop, lasted us a few months before we needed to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Great product, well made & safe.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I’m an insulin dependent Diabetic. This container is well made & the size is great. When it gets full I take it to my pharmacy. they dispose of everything. By law that are considered “Bio Hazard” material & must be treated as such!
customer_reviews.author: Mpowell52

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was really small and I went by the description of large. Should have been more careful.
customer_reviews.author: Bwils00y

customer_reviews.title: okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: expected it to be a bit bigger, but okay for the price
customer_reviews.author: Justanothercustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great size for insulin needles
customer_reviews.text: Great size for insulin needles. I always try to keep an extra on hand when the one being used gets full! Fits nicely under the sink or inconspicuously on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Momof7

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and high quality plastic
customer_reviews.text: Works as described and is easy to close to keep out kids/pets/whatever else might want to hang with some needles. When I'm done with it (and it's full), I plan to turn it in to my local twice-annual hazardous waste pickup. Not a bad price for a year's worth of acupuncture needles!
customer_reviews.author: Kate K.

customer_reviews.title: Does not list a volume and I feel this was deceptive.
customer_reviews.text: This item was advertised as a Large container. The item is approximately a 32 ounce container. Because I have previously gotten a 2 gallon container for this price I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jmeema

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, where you do not keep having to buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Marysch1

customer_reviews.title: Great shape for the size!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this sharps container. The shape is better than others and the opening leaves room for all of the types of sharps that I use. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Mistywd

customer_reviews.title: They are good at what they do
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what there is to say about these sharps containers except that they are a convenient size, durable material and they seal up once full. They are good at what they do.
customer_reviews.author: CatM

customer_reviews.title: Quite small
customer_reviews.text: Not happy because I thought it was a full size sharps container. It is small. Not as small as the smallest but still small. Expensive for the size. Too small for my intended use.
customer_reviews.author: S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Safe disposal
customer_reviews.text: We needed to safely dispose of meds and this worked great. All of the expired meds fit in this great and has a tight lid.
customer_reviews.author: MizaryTop Contributor: Fashion Design

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, secure and would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I don't how much to say about this, simply because it is a plastic tub with a rotating lid to keep needles in. It seems solid enough to take a knife to it and not damage it. All in all worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Good size for households .
customer_reviews.text: Good size for households. Holds decent amount of Pen Needles .
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: does the job of keeping my pen needles safe for disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Suits its purpose!
customer_reviews.text: Husband is a T2. This works for his syringes (1 a day) and his other small trash while testing. We moved up from the 1qt and this lasts about months now.
customer_reviews.author: TheMrsW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I needed this container because I use a lot of them
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie Gaskin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The picture of the product shows a cover but the delivered item does not include it.
customer_reviews.author: bobology

customer_reviews.title: will work great for what I need it for
customer_reviews.text: Using for halloween party to put empty shot syringes in... will work great for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Jacinda05

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: great place to save your needles in and pokey thiungies and safe for people won't get hurt if they are too nosy to get them!
customer_reviews.author: Salem

customer_reviews.title: Nice and large
customer_reviews.text: I bought this container to replace another 2.2 quart one which I had filled up after 13 years. I like the large size and know it will last me for several years which definitely makes it a good value.
customer_reviews.author: TVBP

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: it does what it is supposed to. Easy to drop sharps in from the top, big enough to deposit empty 20ml vials.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This sharps container is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This sharps container is perfect for me. I figure I will only have to empty it once a month. Perfect for the type 2 diabetic that only uses insulin when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mirk

customer_reviews.title: I like this container.
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to dispose of sharpes in a responsible way until I got this container. It is nice for a home unit.
customer_reviews.author: H. H. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: This is great, but an empty gallon container works just as well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I went on the insulin pump to dispose of the needles I use to fill my Omnipod with insulin. You can, however, save yourself some money by just getting a 1/2 gallon empty milk container, writing "Used Insulin Syringes" on the outside & then taking it to either the hospital or in my small town the garbage disposal company takes sharps containers for free when you drop them off to their office. This stores a lot of needles, however, and I can see it's purpose in a professional environment.
customer_reviews.author: MinPinMom

customer_reviews.title: ... it came WITHOUT a lid so it was totally useless.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a lot smaller than described and it came WITHOUT a lid so it was totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: cristina morris

customer_reviews.title: am pleased with it's capacity for home use
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I had expected, am pleased with it's capacity for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L Akers

customer_reviews.title: Great convenient size!
customer_reviews.text: The size is right and it is still portable or put it away conveniently in a drawer! Like the oversize opening!
customer_reviews.author: weekend_cyclist

customer_reviews.title: A bit small but fine
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit smaller than expected but fine. It is not functional yet so won't know until it is
customer_reviews.author: Gokula Chandran

customer_reviews.title: does what it's supposed to, mostly
customer_reviews.text: it does what it is supposed to do, but be aware, auto-injectors are too tall to stand upright. They fit, but at a slant so I won't be able to get as many in there as I should be able to.
customer_reviews.author: Kuhlmom

product_meta.title: Kendall Sharps Container, Large
product_meta.description: This is a sharps container made out of puncture proof plastic. It is ultra durable and leak proof. It is also large volume container at 2.2 quarts. Safe, Convenient Disposal of Used Sharps. Made in the U.S.A.
feature_bullets: Large 2.2 quart capacity, Made in the U.S.A.
Plastic is puncture and leak proof
It has a permanently locking, snap-top lid
For disposal of any type of syringes, pen needles or lancets

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
